title: LF > Diamond++ Jungle for ranked 5's - grind to master tier.
body:
http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/attachments/58/929/mastertier.png

***Please do NOT add me ingame; just fill out the application. Thanks in advance. ***

**Requirements**
- Diamond in solo queue rating.
- No background noise during gaming.
- Skype and a good quality microphone.
- Commitment to the team. 
- Positive attitude. 
- Be ready to learn new champions and new way of playing the game. 
- Listen to the shot caller - don't argue ingame. You can question calls post-game only. 
*I will be looking at your most played champions in soloqueue, so try not to apply for a role you don't play*

**Application**
IGN:
Age:
Rank (all seasons you've placed in):
Top 5 champions:
Time-zone:
Availability:
Competitive experience:
Shot calling:

replies.body:
IGN: Stezey
Age: 17
Rank (all seasons you've placed in): s3: gold 5  s4: diamond 3
Top 5 champions: Lee sin, Pantheon, Jarvan IV, Elise, Nunu
Time-zone: Est
Availability: I can always be available for the team
Competitive experience: I have played on 2 teams in one of them we got to D4 in 5s and played in tournaments every weekend.
Shot calling: On previous teams i was the shot caller for early/mid game but with more experience i am sure i can go into late game as well

IGN: Kirbby
Age: 18
Rank (all seasons you've placed in): s2: 2000 elo s3: DIamond s4: plat 2
Top 5 champions:  Jarvan, Pantheon, Fiddlesticks, Vi, Elise/Lee
Time-zone: Mountain
Availability: Anytime I am needed
Competitive experience: Diamond ranked team in s3 and s4. Played in the GGL, OLS, and NGG this season (LCS-style community 8 week tournaments). Also have taken part in Go4LoLs and a few other smaller tournaments. Went to PAX west + east with team in s3. Participated in the Denver invitational in september and october. Placed in a highschool tournament in OHIO. (Just moved to colorado this year)
Shot calling: Shot call almost all game for objectives and what to do. probably one of my best attributes. I DO NOT, shotcall on who to focus in team fights, that is the only thing i dont shotcall for.

GN: selfz
Age: 19
Rank (all seasons you've placed in): s2:silver S3:Plat s4:diamond
Top 5 champions: lee,vi,kha,j4,panth
Time-zone: est
Availability: everyday 
Competitive experience: 2 years
Shot calling: im the one that mostly does it in all the team i am on, early mid game shot calling my best.

IGN: Shi Ho Lee
Age: 20
Rank: S1: 1300 elo S2: 2000 elo S3: D2 S4: D4 ( haven't been playing as much, getting back into it for next season though).
Top 5: Ezreal, Lucian, jinx. graves, twitch
Time Zone: PST
Availability, any time after 2pm sometimes sooner
Competitive exp: I played in small tourneys in the past like go4lol
Shot Calling: I don't enjoy it but am good at it. Will only do if we don't have another shot caller.
